channel.title: RunePkers | 718 | Amazing PvM | Amazing Skilling | Tons of content | Looking Sta
channel.description:
[center][img]http://runepkers.net/images/1point6/logo.png[/img]
Welcome to RunePkers
We are a 718 with loading 742 graphics to ensure you you get the best graphics. We strive for perfection and a nice time for our players. We actually listen to suggestions posted on the forums, We take the time for our players. Expect tons of new content comming up!
www.RunePkers.net [Official Forums] www.play.RunePkers.net [Instant playing over our webclient] https://www.dropbox.com/s/mvne9ql8500rrgr/RunePkers.jar [Downloadable .jar client]
Anyway I could type pages full of why you should join us, But you'd rather see some pictures/features:
Features: Choose your own XP Rates Dicing Amazing Donator zone 100% Revenants 100% Nex with Minions 100% Godwars Bosses (All of them) 100% Corporal Beast 100% Queen Black Dragon!! 100% Glacors 100% Avatar of Destruction 100% Tormented Demons 100% Kalphite Queen 100% Yk'Lagor the Thunderous Blink Party Demon King black dragon 24 Skills trainable including Dungeoneering, Summoning & Hunter Fully working Fight Caves Fully working The Kiln minigame Clan wars PvP 100% Barrows Dominion Tower The Crucible Unlimited Waved Zombie Minigame! 18 Achievements ready to complete with amazing rewards! Account Manager system (Includes Changing password, Changing display name and much more! Support ticket system at home to ensure the best service we can provide.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2HfO6ap.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HSHnEQN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jqaj8R2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f8krrWm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k29h0PO.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4O9HgSt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bbOoVgK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rnEbVjh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RaAUlnS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CW3HKIX.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PrGdvHe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VmQCxcs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/szpZPAF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LeV4rbu.jpg[/img]
And a shitload of more content,
See you in-game.
RunePkers Staff Team!
[/center]
